title: To Be Your Love (Accidentally In Love OST)
lyrics: Quang pian ai sa xiang ni de jian bang Quang pian ai qin wen ni de lian bang Quang qiao qiao shou ji shen ying tian man Dang ni de lian shang tou zhe ju sang Dang ni de yu qi bu tong wang chang Xiang zen me zhao hui ni wei xiao shi ke ai mu yang I want to to be your love I want to to be your love Guai wan ceng chuang jin de xiao xiang chu yu di di fang Na xie huang tang ceng zhe shei de xi wang Kuai kuai rang wo zhu jin ni xin li Shou xia bu neng fan hui de yao qing Wo yuan gei ni gei ni wo de suo you Bu guan zhong dian zai na li Yi lu dou tian mi Kuai kuai rang wo kuai jang ai zhan ju Bie zai cang qi na ju wo yuan yi Wo zai zhe li deng ni bu zai you yu Gei wo zhuan shu de tian mi
